page.title: 04HOUSING continued
page.content: altogether when they are finished. We then went to interview the few people who already lived on the site. The questions we asked them were about the houses and themselves.Out of{five} people{four}had gas central heating and one used solid fuel.The first person that we interviewed used to live in Cumbria, the next used to live just outside Allendale. The third person came from Perthshire, the forth from Whickham near Newcastle.The last one came from Slaggyford near Alston. Two of the five were{Housewives;} another was a{Computer Operator}and another was a{Clerk in Holy Orders.} The last was a retired{Electrical {Engineer.}For the next question we inquired how many rooms there were altogether in the house, the first was fairly small with only{six}rooms, the next was much larger with{eleven}rooms
